An epic van for your adventure

The Underground Vans

The Underground Vans is an awesome company that provides a digital nomad space on wheels! Plus they have great service. If you're traveling through Europe and would like to try the vanlife for your trip which is much more affordable than cafes, co-work spaces and accommodation, we highly recommend looking at The Underground Vans.

Use my promo code to get a wopping 10% discount off your next booking (about $350)!! Promo code: shesinthewild
